sentences: Ta on kogu aeg draamalavastaja olnud, nüüd proovib kätt operetiga.
Kuule, tule kaasa, sul on mängudes õnne. Tahtsime täna õhtul veidi kätt katsuda.
context: The word 'proovib' is the third person singular present form of the verb 'proovima', which means to try or test something. It's commonly used when someone attempts to do something for the first time or tries out a new activity, skill, or approach. The phrase 'kätt proovima/katsuda' specifically means to test one's hand at something or give something a try.
